main event: A UFO sighting occurred in Houston, Texas on November 27, 1953, at 9:15 PM. The observation lasted 3-5 minutes and was reported by a civilian source. The conclusion drawn was that it was a possible cluster balloon.
interesting points: The UFO sighting took place in Houston, Texas in 1953, reported by a civilian source.
The observation lasted 3-5 minutes, during which the UFO was seen hovering and then gradually disappearing.
No physical evidence or photographs were obtained from the sighting.
The conclusion drawn from the observation was that it was likely a cluster balloon.
Lt. Hardy and Charles Street were the observers of this UFO sighting, offering some credibility to the report.
witnesses: Lt. Hardy and Charles Street, civilian source
